name: Wolfenstein 3D (itch) (BlueChesFri39)
description:
This is ECwolf a Wolfenstein 3D source port FYI not by me. So I thought it would be 

nice to have a working port of Wolfenstein 3D so ya also I give ALL of the credit to 

the creators of ECwolf and Wolfenstein 3D NOT me, Here is the link to the official

page of ECwolf but be warned if anything happens on the sight I am NOT responsible for it. Linchs: Download - ECWolf (maniacsvault.net) Here is ware I got the Wolfenstein 3D files: Wolfenstein 3D (MS-DOS) : ID Software : Free Download, Borrow, and Streaming : Internet Archive.
